benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 30.

benefits.name: Free Casting
effects: Whenever you cast a spell with a level 1-4 spell slot, roll 1d4. If the number you roll is the same as the slot's level, the slot isn't expended.
